articles.description: It is been rumored that Microsoft will hold an event soon following the company's $7.5 billion acquisition of Bethesda Studios.
articles.content: Microsoft might finally complete its major acquisition of ZeniMax Media, the parent company of Bethesda Softworks. The deal reportedly set Microsoft back by a whopping $7.5 billion but will significa… [+2045 chars]
